 <title>Ryan Gosling Explains What It's Like Living With 3 Beautiful Girls</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Ryan-Gosling-Talking-About-His-Daughters-GMA-2016-41290853</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Ryan-Gosling-Talking-About-His-Daughters-GMA-2016-41290853"><img width="160" height="160" src="http://media2.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/714/n/1922398/35a58aeb_edit_img_image_14344989_1463069195_RySQ.large.jpg" /></a><p></p>
<p>Ryan Gosling may have <i>just</i> <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Ryan-Gosling-Eva-Mendes-Welcome-Second-Child-May-2016-41251320" >welcomed his second child with Eva Mendes</a>, but he's also hot on the promotional trail for his new movie, <strong>Nice Guys</strong>. His jam-packed week has already yielded an <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Ryan-Gosling-Jimmy-Kimmel-Live-May-2016-41256605" >appearance on Jimmy Kimmel Live</a>, a <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Ryan-Gosling-Nice-Guys-Premiere-LA-May-2016-41266164" >very handsome red carpet premiere</a>, and on Thursday morning, a stop at <strong>Good Morning America</strong>. But that doesn't mean Ryan's dad duties aren't on his mind. During the morning-show interview, host Amy Robach asked what it's been like having three ladies in his life. "It's heaven," he said with a cute smile. "It's like walking through a field of flowers every day. I live with angels." See what else he had to say about his gals with his <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Ryan-Gosling-Talks-Fatherhood-People-Magazine-May-2016-41257642" >recent quotes about fatherhood</a>.<br />
<br></p>
<center>
<blockquote class="twitter-tweet" data-lang="en">
<p lang="en" dir="ltr">WATCH: "It's like walking through a field of flowers everyday." - <a href="https://twitter.com/RyanGosling"  target="_blank">@RyanGosling</a> on 3-to-1 girl ratio in his house now <a href="https://t.co/twV8a8V12A"  target="_blank">https://t.co/twV8a8V12A</a></p>
<p>- Good Morning America (@GMA) <a href="https://twitter.com/GMA/status/730739548016123905"  target="_blank">May 12, 2016</a></p></blockquote>
<script async="" src="//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js" charset="utf-8"></script></center>
</description>

<item>
 <title>OK, Chris Evans and Jenny Slate Are Actually So Cute Together</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Chris-Evans-Jenny-Slate-Pictures-October-2015-41275095</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Chris-Evans-Jenny-Slate-Pictures-October-2015-41275095"><img width="107" height="160" src="http://media3.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/11/831/n/1922398/4a94ea79_edit_img_cover_file_16360412_1462992705_AG_089764_005PKKebg_wm.large.jpg" /></a><p>Hearts everywhere broke on Wednesday when it was revealed that Chris Evans is officially off the market. The <strong>Captain America: Civil War</strong> star has been <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Chris-Evans-Dating-Jenny-Slate-41269412" target="_blank">quietly dating actress and comedian Jenny Slate</a> since March. The couple costar in the upcoming movie <strong>Gifted</strong> and also made a sweet appearance on <a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Anna Faris" href="http://www.popsugar.com/Anna-Faris" target="_blank">Anna Faris</a>'s podcast together in April. But while their romance is still new, their sweet chemistry has actually been brewing for a while now. The pair were spotted laughing and singing to each other in between takes of their film back in October. In the snaps, Chris giggles as Jenny appears to belt out a few tunes and stares at him lovingly. Keep reading to see more of their swoon-worthy stroll, then check out <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/New-Celebrity-Couples-2016-40477084" target="_blank">all the other new couples of 2016</a>!</p>
</description>

 <title>Follow Kristen Stewart's Très Chic Week at the Cannes Film Festival</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Kristen-Stewart-Cannes-Film-Festival-2016-Pictures-41290331</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Kristen-Stewart-Cannes-Film-Festival-2016-Pictures-41290331"><img width="107" height="160" src="http://media1.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/709/n/1922398/3605dbbc_edit_img_cover_file_41290331_1463067725_GettyImages-53TezDnC.large.jpg" /></a><p><a href="http://www.popsugar.com/Kristen-Stewart" >Kristen Stewart</a> touched down in France for the Cannes Film Festival earlier this week, and she is already one of the coolest stars on the red carpet. Kristen <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Blake-Lively-Kristen-Stewart-Cannes-Film-Festival-2016-41269724" >was all smiles during a photocall</a> for her new film, <a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Woody Allen" href="http://www.popsugar.com/Woody-Allen" target="_blank">Woody Allen</a>'s <strong>Café Society</strong>, on Wednesday when she got silly with the crowd by snapping a few photos on her disposable camera. Later that evening, she stunned at the movie's premiere with her glamorous getup, and the the next day, she posed for a few photos with costar <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/Blake-Lively" >Blake Lively</a>. To see more of the event, check out <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/fashion/Cannes-Film-Festival-Style-2016-41269799" >all the glamorous arrivals</a>.</p>
</description>

<item>
 <title>Hayden Panettiere Is Reentering Treatment For Postpartum Depression</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Hayden-Panettiere-Treatment-Postpartum-Depression-2016-41296155</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Hayden-Panettiere-Treatment-Postpartum-Depression-2016-41296155"><img width="160" height="160" src="http://media2.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/978/n/1922398/f468ac22_edit_img_image_845315_1463091195.large.jpg" /></a><p></p>
<p><br>
<p><a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Hayden Panettiere" href="http://www.popsugar.com/Hayden-Panettiere" target="_blank">Hayden Panettiere</a> is checking into a rehab facility for ongoing treatment of her postpartum depression. The actress <a href="https://twitter.com/haydenpanettier/status/730854394770673665"  target="_blank">took to Twitter on Thursday to announce the news</a>, saying, "The postpartum depression I have been experiencing has impacted every aspect of my life. Rather than stay stuck due to unhealthy coping mechanisms I have chosen to take time to reflect holistically on my health and life. Wish me luck!" The same day Hayden made her announcement, it was also revealed that her <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/entertainment/ABC-Cancels-Nashville-41295954" >ABC show Nashville had been canceled</a> after four seasons.</p>
<p>Hayden first opened up <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Hayden-Panettiere-Out-NYC-October-2015-38757684" >about her struggles with postpartum depression</a> in October, nearly a year after giving birth to her daughter, Kaya. At the time, her rep confirmed to <strong>People</strong> that she would be receiving treatment, and Hayden had been vocal about her battle, saying in an interview, "Women need to know that they're not alone, and that it does heal." In January, she <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Hayden-Panettiere-Critics-Choice-Awards-2016-39836107" >made her return to the red carpet at the Critics' Choice Awards</a> and also <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Hayden-Panettiere-Wladimir-Klitschko-After-Treatment-39237187" >supported her fiancé, Wladimir Klitschko</a>, at his boxing match in Germany. </p>
<p>As recently as March, Hayden seemed to be gaining control of her depression and hoping to inspire other women to be equally brave. During <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Hayden-Panettiere-Talks-About-Postpartum-Depression-2016-40678373" >an interview with People</a>, the 26-year-old revealed that she had "been trying to be much more open and honest about who I am," adding, "I'm an adult, and [I don't] have to falsify who I am." </p>
</description>
 <comments>http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Hayden-Panettiere-Treatment-Postpartum-Depression-2016-41296155#comment</comments>

<item>
 <title>Justin Timberlake Reveals That He Constantly Worries About Son Silas: "It Changes Everything"</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Justin-Timberlake-Talks-About-Son-Silas-Today-May-2016-41289944</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Justin-Timberlake-Talks-About-Son-Silas-Today-May-2016-41289944"><img width="160" height="160" src="http://media4.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/679/n/1922398/87ffe584_edit_img_image_17053399_1463064719.large.jpg" /></a><div class='sugar-embed-player'><div style="position:relative; padding-bottom:63%; padding-bottom:-webkit-calc(56.25% + 50px); padding-bottom:calc(56.25% + 50px); height: 0;"><iframe style="position:absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%;" src="http://www.today.com/offsite/justin-timberlake-anna-kendrick-tout-trolls-at-cannes-684361283671" scrolling="no" frameborder="0"></iframe></div></div><p>After taking two years off to be a dad, <a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Justin Timberlake" href="http://www.popsugar.com/Justin-Timberlake" target="_blank">Justin Timberlake</a> is back in the spotlight and <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Justin-Timberlake-Cannes-Film-Festival-2016-Pictures-41278828" >taking the Cannes Film Festival by storm</a>. The singer, who <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/entertainment/Anna-Kendrick-Justin-Timberlake-Sing-True-Colors-Cannes-41270423" >recently performed an epic cover</a> of "True Colors" with his <strong>Trolls</strong> costar <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/Anna-Kendrick" >Anna Kendrick</a>, couldn't help but <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Justin-Timberlake-Talks-About-Son-Silas-May-2016-41256683" >talk about his 1-year-old son, Silas</a>, during a recent interview with <strong>Today</strong>. "It changes everything," he said about becoming a dad. "Hopefully one day when he sees it [his new movie], he'll be like, 'Yeah, that's my dad.'" So cute! Not only did he gush about <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Pictures-Justin-Timberlake-Jessica-Biel-Baby-Silas-37305363" >his precious family</a>, but he also admitted that <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/entertainment/Justin-Timberlake-New-Album-2016-Details-41273938" >he definitely has a new album on the way</a>. Check out the sweet video above, then listen to <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/entertainment/Justin-Timberlake-Cant-Stop-Feeling-41206359" >his hit new single, "Can't Stop the Feeling!"</a></p>
</description>

<item>
 <title>Rachel Roy Makes One of Her First Official Appearances Since Beyoncé Dropped Lemonade</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Rachel-Roy-Charity-Event-LA-May-2016-41288736</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Rachel-Roy-Charity-Event-LA-May-2016-41288736"><img width="117" height="160" src="http://media3.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/647/n/1922398/59becbb1_edit_img_cover_file_41288736_1463061992_GettyImages-53o8w7kj.large.jpg" /></a><p>It looks like <a href="http://www.shopstyle.com/browse/rachel-roy?pid=uid921-3589-70" class="ss_inline_link auto_link_filter no_shopsense_url_rewrite" title="Shop for Rachel Roy" target="_blank">Rachel Roy</a> is taking a page out of <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/Beyonce-Knowles" >Beyoncé</a>'s book by making lemonade out of lemons. After receiving a ton of slack for <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/beauty/What-Does-Becky-Good-Hair-Mean-41062522" >reportedly being "Becky with the good hair"</a> from Beyoncé's song "Sorry," the fashion designer made one of her first official appearances since <strong>Lemonade</strong> dropped at a charity event in LA on Thursday. While she appeared cool and collected as she chatted on her cell phone, she did, in fact, opt to conceal her hair by putting it up in a bun. </p>
<p>The drama first started when she alluded to being <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/Jay-Z" >Jay Z</a>'s other woman in a controversial snap on Instagram. Even though she has since made a public statement deflating those rumors, that hasn't stopped the BeyHive from attacking her on social media with numerous lemon and bee emoji. See more pictures from her latest appearance ahead, and then check out <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Did-Jay-Z-Cheat-Beyonce-Rachel-Roy-41064796" >the full rundown on that infamous lyric</a>.</p>
</description>

<item>
 <title>Chloë Grace Moretz Keeps the Cute Photos of Boyfriend Brooklyn Beckham Coming</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Chloe-Grace-Moretz-Brooklyn-Beckham-Dating-41225289</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Chloe-Grace-Moretz-Brooklyn-Beckham-Dating-41225289"></a><p>It looks like things are getting serious between Brooklyn Beckham and Chloë Grace Moretz. After <a href="http://www.laineygossip.com/Chloe-Grace-Moretz-and-Brooklyn-Beckham-reportedly-inseparable-at-family-dinner--rumoured-to-be-dating/43577"  target="_blank">months of speculation</a>, it appears as though Chloë and Brooklyn are finally making their relationship Instagram official. Brooklyn took to Instagram and uploaded <a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/BFE3Xc0xbJo/?taken-by=brooklynbeckham"  target="_blank">a black-and-white snap</a> of the actress sitting in what appears to be a hotel hallway with bags of takeout, writing, "Late night take out with the bae" in early May. Chloë - who <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Chloe-Grace-Moretz-Glamour-June-2016-Interview-41190820" >graces the June cover of Glamour magazine</a> - also shared <a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/BFU2hWvjnb1/?taken-by=chloegmoretz"  target="_blank">a few photos of her and Brooklyn looking all loved up</a>, and although the images are captionless, it leads us to believe these two are more than just friends. </p>
<p>Of course, this isn't the first time <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Chloe-Moretz-Brooklyn-Beckham-Ed-Sheeran-Concert-35584251" >these two have been romantically linked</a>. The two briefly dated back in 2014 and even <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Chloe-Moretz-Brooklyn-Beckham-Teen-Choice-Awards-35452294" >attended the Teen Choice Awards together</a>. Keep reading for a look at Chloë and Brooklyn's posts, and then <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Chloe-Moretz-Inspirational-Quotes-35379929" >see why she's exactly the kind of girl we need more of in Hollywood</a>.</p>
</description>

<item>
 <title>Katy Perry Responds to Rumors That Orlando Bloom Cheated on Her in the Classiest Way Possible</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Katy-Perry-Responds-Orlando-Bloom-Cheating-Rumors-41298119</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Katy-Perry-Responds-Orlando-Bloom-Cheating-Rumors-41298119"><img width="160" height="160" src="http://media4.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/112/n/1922398/771dc8eb_edit_img_image_17268548_1463103231_728.large.jpg" /></a><p><small class="source">Image Source: <a href="http://www.gettyimages.com"  rel="nofollow" target="_blank">Getty / Kevin Mazur</a></small></p>
<p>Attention, world: Katy Perry is not here for your cheating "conspiracy." After photos of <a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-news/news/selena-gomez-starts-revival-tour-parties-with-orlando-bloom-w205620?utm_source=popsugar.com&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=pubexchange_article"  target="_blank">Selena Gomez and Orlando Bloom partying together in Las Vegas</a> surfaced, many wondered if Katy, who has been dating Orlando since <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Katy-Perry-Orlando-Bloom-Dating-39751347" >they cozied up to each other at the Golden Globes in January</a>, would have anything to say about it. After <a href="https://twitter.com/katyperry/status/730640626643918848"  target="_blank">tweeting</a>, "is that all there is?" along with a song by Peggy Lee of the same name early on Thursday, Katy brushed off the rumors in the classiest way possible. "Instead of giving energy &amp; eyeballs to a dumb conspiracy, check out how cool this is," she tweeted later that same day, with a link to <a href="http://time.com/4316476/orlando-bloom-unicef-report-education/"  target="_blank">Orlando's charity work with Unicef</a>.</p>
<p>The couple has made plenty of adorable appearances since they started dating earlier this year, from <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Katy-Perry-Orlando-Bloom-Coachella-2016-Pictures-40963063" >holding hands at Coachella</a> in April to spending <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Katy-Perry-Orlando-Bloom-Met-Gala-Afterparty-2016-41175934" >a fun night out at the Met Gala together</a> in May. Here's hoping their romance continues to heat up all Summer. See Katy's tweet below, and then check out <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Katy-Perry-Orlando-Bloom-Charity-Cancer-Gala-2016-40936240" >photos from Katy's recent, stunning red carpet appearance</a>!</p>
<center>
<blockquote class="twitter-tweet" data-lang="en">
<p lang="en" dir="ltr">Instead of giving energy &amp; eyeballs to dumb conspiracy 🚮 check out how C👁👁L this is: <a href="https://t.co/ClmGlPMz3x"  target="_blank">https://t.co/ClmGlPMz3x</a> <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/dontfeedthebeast?src=hash"  target="_blank">#dontfeedthebeast</a></p>
<p>- KATY PERRY (@katyperry) <a href="https://twitter.com/katyperry/status/730900759873626112"  target="_blank">May 12, 2016</a></p></blockquote>

 <title>LOL: Ryan Gosling Is Pushing Daughter Esmeralda Into a "Chalk Battle" With Neighborhood Kids</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Ryan-Gosling-Ellen-DeGeneres-Show-May-2016-41296455</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Ryan-Gosling-Ellen-DeGeneres-Show-May-2016-41296455"><img width="160" height="160" src="http://media1.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/994/n/1922398/f19e3d63_edit_img_image_845315_1463092358.large.jpg" /></a><iframe width="728" height="424" src="//widgets.ellentube.com/videos/0-8qjjgdqr/" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe><p><a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Ryan Gosling" href="http://www.popsugar.com/Ryan-Gosling" target="_blank">Ryan Gosling</a> stopped by <strong>The <span class="nobrand">Ellen DeGeneres</span> Show</strong> on Thursday to promote his new film,<strong> Nice Guys</strong>, and was of course asked about the other new arrival in his life: his <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Ryan-Gosling-Talking-About-His-Daughters-GMA-2016-41290853" >second daughter, Amada Lee, who was born last month</a>. Ryan confirmed news that he was a dad of two before launching into a story about his older daughter, 19-month-old Esmeralda, and how he's been trying to show her a thing or two about respect and honor - especially when it comes to neighborhood kids.</p>
<p>"I heard that if you tag over someone else's tag, that's how you start a battle," he said. "Now, I take my little girl to the park and we always write her name in chalk . . . and some kid has been erasing her name and writing their name over it." Ryan then explained to Ellen how he plans to teach little Esmeralda "a reasonable amount of vengeance." Watch the clip above now.<br></p>
</description>

 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Keith-Urban-Throwback-Thursday-Photo-Ellen-2016-41288158"><img width="160" height="160" src="http://media3.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/603/n/1922398/ddfe0ba4_edit_img_image_17268548_1463059399_728.large.jpg" /></a><div class='sugar-embed-player'><iframe width="728" height="410" src="//widgets.ellentube.com/videos/0-3sy3zz0q/" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe></div><p>Fans likely learned a whole lot about <a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Keith Urban" href="http://www.popsugar.com/Keith-Urban" target="_blank">Keith Urban</a> when he stopped by <strong>The <span class="nobrand">Ellen DeGeneres</span> Show</strong> on Thursday morning.  <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Jennifer-Lopez-Mariah-Carey-Feud-41280591"><img width="160" height="160" src="http://media2.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/11/035/n/1922398/90504a78_edit_img_cover_file_41280591_1463009924_mainALCi1F.large.jpg" /></a><p>It all began in the early 2000s when <a href="http://www.shopstyle.com/browse/mariah-carey?pid=uid3081-22493509-25" class="ss_inline_link auto_link_filter no_shopsense_url_rewrite" title="Shop for Mariah Carey" target="_blank">Mariah Carey</a> gave an interview to a German TV show and was asked to share her thoughts on <a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Jennifer Lopez" href="http://www.popsugar.com/Jennifer-Lopez" target="_blank">Jennifer Lopez</a> and Beyoncé. After saying nothing but nice things about Beyoncé, the "We Belong Together" singer quipped with, "I don't know her," in response to Jennifer. Since then, rumors of an alleged feud between the two stars have swirled, and while the <strong>Shades of Blue</strong> actress has tried to clear the air by <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Jennifer-Lopez-Talks-About-Ben-Affleck-Relationship-Video-35036964" >stating they aren't true</a>, Mariah recently threw fire into the flame by <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Mariah-Carey-Responds-Jennifer-Lopez-Comments-40487975" >clapping back at Jennifer</a>, saying, "I still don't know her." Read on for a full rundown of how this reported beef came to be, and then check out <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Biggest-Celebrity-Feuds-2015-39261069" >the biggest celebrity feuds that went down last year</a>.</p>
</description>

 <title>Follow Blake Lively on Her Flawless Week at the Cannes Film Festival</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Blake-Lively-Cannes-Film-Festival-2016-Pictures-41273929</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Blake-Lively-Cannes-Film-Festival-2016-Pictures-41273929"><img width="107" height="160" src="http://media1.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/595/n/1922398/ef07e6b645e16241_GettyImages-530954234Sd0GG0.large.jpg" /></a><p><a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Blake Lively" href="http://www.popsugar.com/Blake-Lively" target="_blank">Blake Lively</a> landed in the South of France <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Blake-Lively-France-May-2016-41244087" >for the Cannes Film Festival</a> this week, and the actress is already blowing us away with <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/fashion/Blake-Lively-Juan-Carlos-Obando-Jumpsuit-Cannes-2016-41269563" >her stunning red carpet looks</a> and cute glimpses of her growing baby bump. Blake, who is <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Blake-Lively-Pregnant-Set-April-2016-40942408" >pregnant with her second child with husband Ryan Reynolds</a>, kicked things off at a photocall for her new film, <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/entertainment/Cafe-Society-Trailer-41036334" >Woody Allen's Café Society</a>, on Wednesday; she was all smiles in a red jumpsuit and <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Blake-Lively-Kristen-Stewart-Cannes-Film-Festival-2016-41269724" >shared sweet interactions with her costars Kristen Stewart</a>, Jesse Eisenberg, and Corey Stoll. Later that evening, Blake was back on the carpet <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/fashion/Blake-Lively-Dress-Cafe-Society-Cannes-Premiere-41275104" >in a gold sequined gown</a> for the movie's premiere, which also coincided with the festival's star-studded opening ceremony, and the next day she stepped out in a gorgeous yellow velvet dress. </p>
<p>Keep reading to see all of Blake's flawless moments from the Cannes Film Festival so far, and be sure to <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/fashion/Cannes-Film-Festival-Style-2016-41269799" >keep up with all the glamorous arrivals</a>. </p>
</description>

<item>
 <title>Prince Harry and 95-Year-Old Ruth Uffleman Are Our New Celebrity Dream Couple</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Prince-Harry-Kissing-Elderly-Woman-Hand-Invictus-Games-41294292</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Prince-Harry-Kissing-Elderly-Woman-Hand-Invictus-Games-41294292"><img width="160" height="111" src="http://media2.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/886/n/1922398/f90c81e2e6345a45_GettyImages-530974384_masterpmtRWd.large.jpg" /></a><p>New couple alert? Prince Harry got up close and personal with 95-year-old Ruth Uffleman, a woman checking out the Invictus Games in Orlando, FL, on Thursday. After presenting medals to the United Kingdom team after their wheelchair tennis match, Harry knelt down to speak with Ruth, and things got intense pretty quickly; he was spotted holding and kissing her hand, and the two posed for a few photos together while staring into each other's eyes. At one point, it even looked like Ruth was going in for a sweet smooch.
<p>Harry is now wrapping up <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Prince-Harry-Visits-United-States-Pictures-41263055" >his recent trip to the States</a> for the annual event, which hosts Paralympic-style games for wounded, injured, and sick servicemen and women. Throughout his visit, <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Prince-Harry-Invictus-Games-Photos-2016-41242461" >he's mixed and mingled with the international teams</a> and turned on the charm for First Lady Michelle Obama and Second Lady Jill Biden, as well as <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Prince-Harry-Invictus-Games-Orlando-May-2016-41225076" >a few babies and dogs</a>. Harry also <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Prince-Harry-Talks-About-His-Love-Life-Princess-Diana-41243770" >opened up about his love life</a> in an interview with <strong>Sunday Times</strong> this week, saying that right now he's focused "very much on work" and that "even if I talk to a girl, that person is then suddenly my wife, and people go knocking on her door." Get ready, Ruth!</p>
</description>

 <title>Justin Timberlake Is Bringing Sexy Back During His Whirlwind Week at the Cannes Film Festival</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Justin-Timberlake-Cannes-Film-Festival-2016-Pictures-41278828</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Justin-Timberlake-Cannes-Film-Festival-2016-Pictures-41278828"><img width="105" height="160" src="http://media1.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/11/968/n/1922398/af0cb225d6db572a_GettyImages-530615250_masterw7M5lB.large.jpg" /></a><p>The Cannes Film Festival is officially in full swing, and one celebrity who isn't holding back when it comes to enjoying the spotlight is <a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Justin Timberlake" href="http://www.popsugar.com/Justin-Timberlake" target="_blank">Justin Timberlake</a>. The singer and actor touched down in the South of France earlier this week and wasted no time getting into the spirit; Justin and his <strong>Trolls </strong>costar <a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Anna Kendrick" href="http://www.popsugar.com/Anna-Kendrick" target="_blank">Anna Kendrick</a> kicked off the glamorous festival with a fun (and colorful) photocall, where <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Justin-Timberlake-Trolls-Photocall-Cannes-2016-41273359" >Justin couldn't help but bust a few moves</a> with some lady trolls on the red carpet. During the event, the pair also hit the stage to <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/entertainment/Anna-Kendrick-Justin-Timberlake-Sing-True-Colors-Cannes-41270423" >perform a beautiful rendition of Cyndi Lauper's "True Colors"</a> - and later that evening, Justin slipped into a <a href="http://www.shopstyle.com/browse/tom-ford?pid=uid3049-1694243-51" class="ss_inline_link auto_link_filter no_shopsense_url_rewrite" title="Shop for Tom Ford" target="_blank">Tom Ford</a> tuxedo <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/fashion/Cannes-Film-Festival-Style-2016-41269799" >to join Anna for the star-studded opening ceremony</a>. See all of Justin's memorable moments in Cannes so far, then check out <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Best-Old-Pictures-From-Cannes-Film-Festival-37467077" >the most gorgeous photos from festivals past</a>.</p>
</description>

<item>
 <title>Kit Harington's Comments on Falling For Rose Leslie Will Melt Your Heart</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Kit-Harington-Talks-About-Falling-Love-Rose-Leslie-41292297</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Kit-Harington-Talks-About-Falling-Love-Rose-Leslie-41292297"><img width="160" height="160" src="http://media4.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/801/n/1922398/05768ed0_edit_img_image_41292297_1463076263_kit-rose-th.large.jpg" /></a><p></p>
<p>Kit Harington's sweet story about falling in love with his <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/Game-of-Thrones" >Game of Thrones</a> costar Rose Leslie will definitely make you swoon. He and Rose, who played his onscreen love interest on the show, made their real-life relationship red carpet official when <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Kit-Harington-Rose-Leslie-Olivier-Awards-Red-Carpet-2016-40798803" >they shared loving looks</a> at the Olivier Awards last month. Recently, she also <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Kit-Harington-Rose-Leslie-Together-London-April-2016-41078612" >stepped out to support him</a> on a special night in London, and he opened up about falling for her in a new <a href="http://www.vogue.it/l-uomo-vogue/cover-story/2016/05/11/kit-harington/"  target="_blank">interview with L'Uomo Vogue</a>. </p>
<p>When asked about one of his best memories from the show, <a href="http://www.eonline.com/news/763909/what-game-of-thrones-kit-harington-learned-about-himself-from-reactions-to-jon-snow-s-death"  target="_blank">Kit mentioned three weeks spent filming in Iceland</a> for season two. "Because the country is beautiful, because the Northern Lights are magical, and because it was there that I fell in love," he said. "If you're already attracted to someone, and then they play your love interest in the show, it becomes very easy to fall in love." So sweet! Get to know <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Kit-Harington-Facts-41276004" >more about Kit Harington</a>, then check out some of <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/entertainment/Jon-Snow-Naked-Game-Thrones-Pictures-41243929" >his sexiest moments on Game of Thrones</a>.</p>
</description>

<item>
 <title>George Clooney Hits the Red Carpet With Amal and Cracks Up With Julia Roberts</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/George-Amal-Clooney-Cannes-Film-Festival-2016-41292427</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/George-Amal-Clooney-Cannes-Film-Festival-2016-41292427"><img width="160" height="106" src="http://media4.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/799/n/1922398/3a8036342330cbbe_GettyImages-531017480_master2wCxnP.large.jpg" /></a><p><a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for George Clooney" href="http://www.popsugar.com/George-Clooney" target="_blank">George Clooney</a> was unsurprisingly surrounded by gorgeous women when he hit the red carpet for the Cannes Film Festival premiere of his new movie, <strong>Money Monster</strong>, on Thursday. The actor was joined by <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/George-Clooney-Amal-Alamuddin-Pictures-34506365" >his beautiful wife, Amal</a>, who <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/fashion/Amal-Clooney-Dress-Cannes-Money-Monster-Premiere-41292008" >dazzled in a yellow Atelier Versace gown</a>, as well as his costar <a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Julia Roberts" href="http://www.popsugar.com/Julia-Roberts" target="_blank">Julia Roberts</a>, with whom he shared a laugh while posing for photos. The group then headed inside along with director <a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Jodie Foster" href="http://www.popsugar.com/Jodie-Foster" target="_blank">Jodie Foster</a> for their big screening. Earlier in the day, <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Julia-Roberts-Talks-About-George-Clooney-Marriage-May-2016-41284141" >Julia opened up about Amal</a> in an interview with <strong>ET</strong>, saying that she "changed" George, adding, "in a beautiful way that all wives kind of have a beautiful, loving influence over their husbands." George and Julia, who are reuniting in <strong>Money Monster</strong> for the first time since working together on the Oceans trilogy, also <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Gwen-Stefani-Carpool-Karaoke-James-Corden-Video-41176926" >showed off their singing chops</a> during a recent Carpool Karaoke with <a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Gwen Stefani" href="http://www.popsugar.com/Gwen-Stefani" target="_blank">Gwen Stefani</a> and James Corden.</p>
<p><span></span></p>
</description>

 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Kendall-Jenner-Cannes-Film-Festival-2016-Pictures-41291892"><img width="110" height="160" src="http://media3.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/768/n/1922398/b0a21e2fbec6e4f1_GettyImages-530967408_masterWMfjrg.large.jpg" /></a><p>Kendall Jenner is back in Cannes and ready to party! The 20-year-old model and reality TV star arrived in the South of France this week, just in time to soak up the sun and <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Cannes-Film-Festival-Celebrity-Instagrams-2016-41288409" >glamour of the Cannes Film Festival</a>. On Thursday, Kendall was spotted wearing all white for a Magnum Ice Cream photocall and was also seen enjoying the views from her hotel balcony with her mom, Kris.
